verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about soon afterwards, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2517><s%> that He [began] going <S%G1353><s%> about <S%G1353><s%> from one city <S%G4172><s%> and village <S%G2968><s%> to another, <S%G2596><s%> proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> and preaching <S%G2097><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and the twelve <S%G1427><s%> were with Him,

and [also] some <S%G5100><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G1510><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> of evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> and sicknesses: <S%G769><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> who was called <S%G2564><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> from whom <S%G3739><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%> had gone <S%G1831><s%> out,

and Joanna <S%G2489><s%> the wife <S%G1135><s%> of Chuza, <S%G5529><s%> Herod's steward, <S%G2012><s%> and Susanna, <S%G4677><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> were contributing <S%G1247><s%> to their support <S%G1247><s%> out of their private <S%G5225><s%> means. <S%G5225><s%>

And when a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> were coming <S%G4896><s%> together, <S%G4896><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> from the various <S%G2596><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> were journeying <S%G1975><s%> to Him, He spoke <S%G3004><s%> by way <S%G1223><s%> of a parable: <S%G3850><s%>

"The sower <S%G4687><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to sow <S%G4687><s%> his seed; <S%G4703><s%> and as he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> beside <S%G3844><s%> the road; <S%G3598><s%> and it was trampled <S%G2662><s%> under <S%G2662><s%> foot, <S%G2662><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> ate <S%G2719><s%> it up.

"And other <S%G2087><s%> [seed] fell <S%G2667><s%> on rocky <S%G4073><s%> [soil,] and as soon as it grew <S%G5453><s%> up, it withered <S%G3583><s%> away, <S%G3583><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> moisture. <S%G2429><s%>

"And other <S%G2087><s%> [seed] fell <S%G4098><s%> into the good <S%G18><s%> soil, <S%G1093><s%> and grew <S%G5453><s%> up, and produced <S%G4160><s%> a crop <S%G2590><s%> a hundred <S%G1542><s%> times <S%G1542><s%> as great. <S%G1542><s%>" As He said <S%G3004><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> He would call <S%G5455><s%> out, "He who has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"
And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> [began] questioning <S%G1905><s%> Him as to what <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> might be.

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> " To you it has been granted <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but to the rest <S%G3062><s%> [it is] in parables, <S%G3850><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that seeing <S%G991><s%> they may not see, <S%G991><s%> and hearing <S%G191><s%> they may not understand. <S%G4920><s%>
"Now <S%G1161><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> is this: <S%G3778><s%> the seed <S%G4703><s%> is the word <S%G3056><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

"And those <S%G3588><s%> beside <S%G3844><s%> the road <S%G3598><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who have heard; <S%G191><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> and takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> from their heart, <S%G2588><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that they may not believe <S%G4100><s%> and be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

"And those <S%G3588><s%> on the rocky <S%G4073><s%> [soil are] those who, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they hear, <S%G191><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> with joy; <S%G5479><s%> and these <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [firm] root; <S%G4491><s%> they believe <S%G4100><s%> for a while, <S%G2540><s%> and in time <S%G2540><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> fall <S%G868><s%> away. <S%G868><s%>

"And the [seed] which fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns, <S%G173><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who have heard, <S%G191><s%> and as they go <S%G4198><s%> on their way <S%G4198><s%> they are choked <S%G4846><s%> with worries <S%G3308><s%> and riches <S%G4149><s%> and pleasures <S%G2237><s%> of [this] life, <S%G979><s%> and bring <S%G5052><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fruit <S%G5052><s%> to maturity. <S%G5052><s%>

"And the [seed] in the good <S%G2570><s%> soil, <S%G1093><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are the ones who <S%G3748><s%> have heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in an honest <S%G2570><s%> and good <S%G18><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> and hold <S%G2722><s%> it fast, <S%G2722><s%> and bear <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> with perseverance. <S%G5281><s%>

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> take <S%G991><s%> care <S%G991><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> you listen; <S%G191><s%> for whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall [more] be given; <S%G1325><s%> and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> does not have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he thinks <S%G1380><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from him."

And His mother <S%G3384><s%> and brothers <S%G80><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> to Him, and they were unable <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> to get <S%G4940><s%> to Him because <S%G1223><s%> of the crowd. <S%G3793><s%>
And it was reported <S%G518><s%> to Him, "Your mother <S%G3384><s%> and Your brothers <S%G80><s%> are standing <S%G2476><s%> outside, <S%G1854><s%> wishing <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> You."

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "My mother <S%G3384><s%> and My brothers <S%G80><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> who hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> it."

Now <S%G1161><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> about on one <S%G1520><s%> of [those] days, <S%G2250><s%> that He and His disciples <S%G3101><s%> got <S%G1684><s%> into a boat, <S%G4143><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Let us go <S%G1330><s%> over <S%G1330><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the lake. <S%G3041><s%>" And they launched <S%G321><s%> out.

But as they were sailing <S%G4126><s%> along He fell <S%G879><s%> asleep; <S%G879><s%> and a fierce <S%G2978><s%> gale <S%G2978><s%> of wind <S%G417><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> upon the lake, <S%G3041><s%> and they [began] to be swamped <S%G4845><s%> and to be in danger. <S%G2793><s%>

And they came <S%G4334><s%> to Him and woke <S%G1326><s%> Him up, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Master, <S%G1988><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> we are perishing! <S%G622><s%>" And being aroused, <S%G1326><s%> He rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and the surging <S%G2830><s%> waves, <S%G2830><s%> and they stopped, <S%G3973><s%> and it became <S%G1096><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Where <S%G4226><s%> is your faith <S%G4102><s%>?" And when He had come <S%G1831><s%> out onto <S%G1909><s%> the land, <S%G1093><s%> He was met <S%G5221><s%> by a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> from the city <S%G4172><s%> who was possessed <S%G2192><s%> with demons; <S%G1140><s%> and who had not put <S%G1746><s%> on any clothing <S%G2440><s%> for a long <S%G2425><s%> time, <S%G5550><s%> and was not living <S%G3306><s%> in a house, <S%G3614><s%> but in the tombs. <S%G3418><s%>

For He had been commanding <S%G3853><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> to come <S%G1831><s%> out of the man. <S%G444><s%> For it had seized <S%G4884><s%> him many <S%G4183><s%> times; <S%G5550><s%> and he was bound <S%G1195><s%> with chains <S%G254><s%> and shackles <S%G3976><s%> and kept <S%G5442><s%> under <S%G5442><s%> guard; <S%G5442><s%> and [yet] he would burst <S%G1284><s%> his fetters <S%G1199><s%> and be driven <S%G1643><s%> by the demon <S%G1140><s%> into the desert. <S%G2048><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, "What <S%G5101><s%> is your name <S%G3686><s%>?" And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "Legion <S%G3003><s%>"; for many <S%G4183><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%> had entered <S%G1525><s%> him.
And they were entreating <S%G3870><s%> Him not to command <S%G2004><s%> them to depart <S%G565><s%> into the abyss. <S%G12><s%>

" Return <S%G5290><s%> to your house <S%G3624><s%> and describe <S%G1334><s%> what <S%G3745><s%> great <S%G3745><s%> things <S%G3745><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> for you." And as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> returned, <S%G5290><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> welcomed <S%G588><s%> Him, for they had all <S%G3956><s%> been <S%G1510><s%> waiting <S%G4328><s%> for Him.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Someone <S%G5100><s%> did touch <S%G681><s%> Me, for I was aware <S%G1097><s%> that power <S%G1411><s%> had gone <S%G1831><s%> out of Me."

And when the woman <S%G1135><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> that she had not escaped <S%G2990><s%> notice, <S%G2990><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> trembling <S%G5141><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> down <S%G4363><s%> before <S%G4363><s%> Him, and declared <S%G518><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> the reason <S%G156><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> she had touched <S%G681><s%> Him, and how <S%G5613><s%> she had been immediately <S%G3916><s%> healed. <S%G2390><s%>

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] He answered <S%G611><s%> him, "Do not be afraid <S%G5399><s%> [any longer;] only <S%G3440><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and she shall be made <S%G4982><s%> well. <S%G4982><s%>"

And when He had come <S%G2064><s%> to the house, <S%G3614><s%> He did not allow <S%G863><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> with Him, except <S%G1508><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and the girl's father <S%G3962><s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>
